identity.name: NeuroQuery Design System
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster aesthetics with SaaS functionality
Content is King: Citations and data are the heroes
Zoom In: Focus on the granularity of research data
Negative Space: White space is a feature, not a bug
Contrast: Stark black/white with intentional color bursts

grid_system.dashboard: Control Room Grid: grid-cols-12 gap-4 h-screen overflow-hidden

containers.card: bg-white border border-border rounded-lg p-6 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md px-6 py-2 font-medium shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-md px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all

inputs.default: bg-white border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary rounded-md h-10 px-3 text-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground transition-all

citations.badge: inline-flex items-center justify-center w-5 h-5 text-[10px] font-mono bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 rounded-full hover:bg-primary hover:text-white cursor-pointer transition-colors ml-1 align-super
citations.card: bg-white border border-border shadow-lg rounded-lg p-4 text-sm max-w-sm

chat.bubble_user: bg-slate-100 text-slate-900 rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm px-6 py-4 max-w-[80%]
chat.bubble_ai: bg-white border border-border text-slate-800 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm px-6 py-4 max-w-[90%] shadow-sm

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Swiss Academic' look: High contrast, lots of white space, precise typography.
Use 'Instrument Sans' for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
The 'Debug Panel' should be collapsible and use a monospace font for data.
Citations must be interactive. Hovering a citation number [1] should show a popover with the source text.
Faithfulness score should be a prominent visual indicator (e.g., a gauge or colored bar) next to the answer.
Do NOT use dark mode by default. Force light mode in tailwind config if necessary.
Use the provided abstract 3D images for the landing page hero section to convey 'complex data made simple'.
Ensure the chat interface feels like a professional tool, not a casual messaging app.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic AI aesthetics (purple/teal gradients). Stick to the defined Blue/White/Slate palette.
Use 2-3x more padding than usual. Research tools need breathing room.
All interactive elements must have hover states.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
